name: instagram_search
description: Search for users, hashtags, or places on Instagram. Returns up to 10 results with usernames, full names, follower counts, and profile pictures. You must be logged in to Instagram.

steps.code: const searchLink = document.querySelector('a[href="/explore/"]') || document.querySelector('svg[aria-label="Search"]')?.closest('a') || document.querySelector('svg[aria-label="Search"]')?.closest('div[role="button"]') || Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('svg')).find(s => s.getAttribute('aria-label') === 'Search')?.closest('a, div[role="button"]'); if (searchLink) { searchLink.click(); } return { clicked: !!searchLink }
steps.name: open_search
steps.label: Click search icon
Wait for search panel to open

steps.code: const searchInput = document.querySelector('input[aria-label="Search input"]') || document.querySelector('input[placeholder="Search"]'); if (searchInput) { searchInput.focus(); searchInput.click(); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 300)); searchInput.value = ''; searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true })); document.execCommand('insertText', false, `{{query}}`); searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true })); } return { typed: !!searchInput }
steps.name: type_query
steps.label: Type search query
Wait for search results to load

steps.code: const results = []; const resultItems = document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="/"][role="link"], div[class*="SearchResult"] a, div[role="none"] a[href^="/"]'); const seen = new Set(); for (const item of resultItems) { if (results.length >= 10) break; const href = item.getAttribute('href') || ''; if (!href || href === '/' || href.startsWith('/explore') || href.startsWith('/accounts') || seen.has(href)) continue; seen.add(href); const imgEl = item.querySelector('img'); const spans = item.querySelectorAll('span'); let username = ''; let fullName = ''; let subtitle = ''; const textParts = []; for (const span of spans) { const text = span.textContent.trim(); if (text && !textParts.includes(text)) textParts.push(text); } if (textParts.length >= 1) username = textParts[0]; if (textParts.length >= 2) fullName = textParts[1]; if (textParts.length >= 3) subtitle = textParts.slice(2).join(' '); if (!username && href) username = href.replace(/\//g, ''); results.push({ username: username, full_name: fullName, subtitle: subtitle, profile_pic: imgEl ? imgEl.src : '', url: 'https://www.instagram.com' + href }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
